data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=3zNnv5KF9doQ7kNvgGkXIO3&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYC_6TwzKzYKZcEK8sLhBT1tUbW7Ks0D_OMy5i0k60Zw0g&oe=669E1E4C)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=WCCdXGzp_psQ7kNvgGWQ2gt&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB_XAaqSU6JDqjborcTWcFpC-pnQXg-OKRIvxoYIfp5OQ&oe=669E549F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75392879_331169873202633_892518978300243902_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=RrN7gUyfivUQ7kNvgGKN2np&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBbrSOGN74QUE2wWke0V1xooho1j9V3bMYsaO3Sj5UCrg&oe=669E39F1)
